what: Data Published by the United States Federal Energy Regulatory Commission
title: Data Published by the United States Federal Energy Regulatory Commission
text: energyr R package containing data published United States Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) www.ferc.gov. energyr also package used eAnalytics. learn project, check paper.

title: Data Published by the United States Federal Energy Regulatory Commission
text: electric: Electric Company Financial Data gas: Natural Gas Company Financial Data hydropower: Hydropower Plant Data lng: LNG Plant Data oil: Oil Company Financial Data pipeline: Natural Gas Pipeline Project Data storage: Natural Gas Storage Field Data

title: Data Published by the United States Federal Energy Regulatory Commission
text: install energyr R: install developmental version:

title: Electric Company Rates — electric
text: Electric Company Financial Information reported FERC.

title: Electric Company Rates — electric
text: Data frame columns Company Electric Company Revenue Annual Revenue USD Bill Annual Bill USD Year Reporting Year

title: Electric Company Rates — electric
text: http://www.ferc.gov/industries/electric/annual-charges.asp

title: Electric Company Rates — electric
code: dim(electric) #> [1] 543   4   head(electric) #>                   Company  Revenue    Bill Year #> 1 AEP Texas North Company  1025802   46974 2007 #> 2 AEP Texas North Company      304      15 2008 #> 3 AEP Texas North Company        0       0 2009 #> 4   Alabama Power Company 30124612 1379477 2007 #> 5   Alabama Power Company 28721945 1404710 2008 #> 6   Alabama Power Company 29953339 1633368 2009
